products.title: PUMA Breaker Mesh FOF
products.desc: The PUMA Breaker Mesh Fight or Flight Sneakers are an update to the classic Breaker Sneakers. This shoe jumps to the next level with a modern and futuristic style, combining suede on the laterals and a stretchy material on the tongue. A slightly raised midsole and added sock creates a rough texture with a revolutionary touch. With inspiration from pilots’ garments, these sneakers feature a bold mix of dark bases and pops of vivid orange for a stylish finish.
